name: Performapal Handsome Liger
desc: When this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle and sends it to the GY: You can add 1 Level 5 or higher Pendulum Monster from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Performapal Handsome Liger" once per turn.
str2: Add 1 Level 5 or higher Pendulum Monster to hand
